text: The Emilia's marmoset (Mico emiliae), also known as Snethlage's marmoset, is a marmoset endemic to Brazil.Emmons, L & Feer, F. (1997). Neotropical Rainforest Mammals. It is found only in the Brazilian states of Pará and Mato Grosso. It was named to honour German-born Brazilian ornithologist Emilie Snethlage. ==References== Emilia's marmoset Category:Mammals of Brazil Category:Endemic fauna of Brazil Emilia's marmoset
title: Emilia's marmoset
